summary: A satire on contemporary Kerala politics where brothers turn local leaders of rival parties, leading to distress for their aged and once-proud parents.
cast: Sreenivasan|Jayaram|Thilakan|Mathu|Kaviyoor Ponnamma|Rahul Lakshman|Siddique|Oduvil Unnikrishnan|Mala Aravindan|K.P.A.C. Lalitha|Mammukoya|Sankaradi|Innocent|Bobby Kottarakkara|T.P. Madhavan|T.R. Omana|Byon|Kalabhavan Haneef|James
title: Sandesham
